oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte-de-visite of Confederate heroes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mass-produced carte-de-visite (cdv) of Confederate generals, "Rebel Army of Virginia." Published by E. & H. T. Anthony. The featured Confederate generals include Gen. P.G. T. Beauregard, Gen. Robert E. Lee, Gen. James Longstreet, Gen. A.P. Hill, Gen. Richard S. Ewell, Gen. John C. Breckenridge, and Gen. Fitzhugh Lee. The fact that General Thomas J. "Stonewall" Jackson is not present indicates that this was produced after Jackson's death in April 1863.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ewell, Richard Stoddert, 1817-1872;Hill, A. P. (A. Powell);Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870;Breckinridge, John C. (John Cabell), 1821-1875;Beauregard, G. T. (Gustave Toutant), 1818-1893;Longstreet, James, 1821-1904;Lee, William Henry Fitzhugh, 1837-1891
